examples.example: 这次考试我的分数很不错，这让我感到非常开心和自豪。

translate.english: I got a very good score in this exam, which made me feel very happy and proud.

examples.example: 这次比赛中我取得了很高的分数，这都是我努力的成果。

translate.english: I got a very high score in this competition, and this is all the result of my efforts.

examples.example: 我的努力终于换来了理想的分数，这让我对未来充满了信心。

translate.english: My efforts finally brought about the ideal score, which made me full of confidence in the future.
